SELECT max(billcode) FROM b_inout where billcode like CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d"),"%") and graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
mapper.update: update b_inout set billid=billid ,inplanid=#{inplanid} ,contractid=#{contractid} ,customtype=#{customtype} ,traderid=#{traderid} ,sellmanname=#{sellmanname} ,sellmanwechat=#{sellmanwechat} ,sellmanalipay=#{sellmanalipay} ,sellmanidcard=#{sellmanidcard} ,sellmanaddress=#{sellmanaddress} ,sellmansex=#{sellmansex} ,sellmanphone=#{sellmanphone} ,iccardnum=#{iccardnum} ,trucktype=#{trucktype} ,trucknum=#{trucknum} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,packtype=#{packtype} ,packcount=#{packcount} ,selfreport=#{selfreport} ,printtempid=#{printtempid} ,regtime=#{regtime} ,regstate=#{regstate} ,settlemothod=#{settlemothod} ,onetomany=#{onetomany} ,soucearea=#{soucearea} ,remark=#{remark} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,fprovinceid=#{fprovinceid} ,fcityid=#{fcityid} ,carriername=#{carriername} ,carrieridcard=#{carrieridcard} where billid=#{billid}
